parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the AccessKey pair. Valid values:

*   Active
*   Inactive

parameters.name: UserAccessKeyId
parameters.description: The AccessKey ID of the AccessKey pair for which you want to modify the status.

parameters.name: UserPrincipalName
parameters.description:
The logon name of the RAM user.

If this parameter is empty, the status of the AccessKey pair for the current user is modified.
